name: Perfect Portion Bliss Bars
description: Customized, perfectly portioned bliss bars are ideal for lunch boxes, quick bites, and desserts.

ingredients.name: natural peanut butter or nut-free butter

preparation: Divide 2-3 tbsp Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix into wells of Perfect Petites.
Place cranberries, raisins, peanut butter, shredded coconut, pepitas, remaining sweet dip mix, and apple pie spice into a food processor; blend at high speed until mixture easily sticks together.
Divide by tablespoon into Perfect Petites; press to flatten. Freeze for 10 min until solid; twist pan to pop out.
Store in the refrigerator up to two weeks.
tips: Make ahead and freeze for perfectly portioned, healthier lunchbox treats.
